parameters.query:
INSERT INTO personal_data (category, title, data_json, tags, embedding, is_sensitive, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.category }}',
  '{{ $json.title }}', 
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.data_json) }}'::jsonb,
  ARRAY[{{ $json.tags.map(t => `'${t}'`).join(',') }}],
  '[{{ $json.embedding.join(',') }}]'::vector,
  {{ $json.is_sensitive }},
  '{{ $json.created_at }}'::timestamp,
  '{{ $json.updated_at }}'::timestamp
)
ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
  category = EXCLUDED.category,
  title = EXCLUDED.title,
  data_json = EXCLUDED.data_json,
  tags = EXCLUDED.tags,
  embedding = EXCLUDED.embedding,
  is_sensitive = EXCLUDED.is_sensitive,
  updated_at = EXCLUDED.updated_at;
